category_header:
Pick the categories you are most
interested in on WWD.
slide_1_text: Fashion, beauty, retail news and in-depth analysis from the industry’s leading publication for over 100 years.
slide_2_text: WWD’s expert fashion and beauty snapshot will hit your inbox every morning with trending highlights, breaking news and insights from key industry players.
slide_3_text: You can select categories and topics to create your own personalized WWD reading experience. The items you choose will appear in your Personalized feed.
slide_4_text: You can tap the save icon to save content to read or watch later.
push_notification_title: Stay up to date with the latest breaking news.
try_again: Content not found. Please try again.
digitalDailyDSavedText: You haven't saved any Digital Daily issues.
subscribeToDD:
To Read the Digital Daily 
 You Must Subscribe to WWD
noInternet: No internet, Connect to internet and try again
doNotSell: Do Not Sell My Personal Information
unlimitedDigitalAccess: Unlimited digital access to WWD + Digital Daily
expertReporting: Expert reporting from the leading business publication in fashion and beauty
archieveArticles: Archive articles up to 1 year old
appAccess: WWD iOS and Android app access
afterYourFirstTermIOS: Your Apple ID account will be charged upon purchase confirmation. After your first term, your subscription will automatically renew and your account will be charged $199 annually or $19.99 monthly, as selected below, until you cancel. You may cancel your subscription from your Apple ID account settings at any time but you must turn off auto-renewal at least 24 hours before the end of the current period to avoid being charged again. Payments are non-refundable. We reserve the right to change the number of issues in a subscription term, including discontinuing any format, make substitutions and/or modify the manner in which the subscription is distributed.
afterYourFirstTermAndroid: Your Google Play Store account will be charged upon purchase confirmation. After your first term, your subscription will automatically renew and your account will be charged $199 annually or $19.99 monthly, as selected below, until you cancel. You may cancel your subscription from your Google Play account settings at any time but you must turn off auto-renewal at least 24 hours before the end of the current period to avoid being charged again. Payments are non-refundable. We reserve the right to change the number of issues in a subscription term, including discontinuing any format, make substitutions and/or modify the manner in which the subscription is distributed.
placingYourOrderLabel: By choosing a monthly or annual subscription and placing your order you agree to the terms above and our Terms of Use and Privacy Policy.
placingYourOrder: By choosing a monthly or annual subscription and placing your order you agree to the terms above and our
privacyDescription: We and our partners use technologies, such as cookies, and process personal data, such as IP addresses and cookie identifiers, to personalise ads and content based on your interests, measure the performance of ads and content, and derive insights about the audiences who saw ads and content. By accepting below, you consent to the use of this technology and the processing of your personal data for these purposes.
initialPrivacydesc: We and our partners use technologies, such as cookies, and process personal data, such as IP addresses and cookie identifiers, to personalise ads and content based on your interests, measure the performance of ads and content, and derive insights about the audiences who saw ads and content. By accepting below, you consent to the use of this technology and the processing of your personal data for these purposes. You can change your mind and change your consent choices at any time by heading to the Settings screen of the app.
